item.title: [Project] Customer Churn Prediction
item.description: Customer Turnover (or Churn) is an popular topic for subscription-based industries (e.g. T-Mobile, Netflix), particularly in telecommunications. In this project, I used a dataset from a fictional telco company (from Kaggle & IBM) to train classification models. The models can be deployed to determine whether a customer is likely to churn based on the probability assigned by the model to each customer in the dataset. Click on this page for the modeling process.

item.title: About Me
item.description: Hi, I am Tony Yip, an aspiring Data Scientist with two years of industry experience as an Data/BI Analyst. I have an academic background in Business Administration: Business Analytics and Decision-Making Management Information Systems Operations Management All of which emphasize on the importance of data-driven decision making. I am a strong believer of each problem having multiple, creative solutions. All of which are supported, yet not limited to data visualization, modeling, and storytelling.
